attributes.action: Make it so that soap operas can only be shown after the watershed time of 9pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the ever decreasing moral of storylines shown within these programmes, I feel they promote nothing but negativity.  Episode to episode shows fighting, arguements and deaths.  I feel that as these are shown in the erly evening, our children are subject to veiwing this.  I do not think that it is suitable viewing, especially at that time in the day when something more productive like documentaries or even a light hearted movie could be shown in its place.  I do feel this is a matter that needs attention.
